Articles.Content:
Failure; it can't even get to the Mun, let alone Low Kerbin Orbit, because you forgot to slap on a proper rocket engine.

I send a missile to destroy a dead/nonfunctioning spacecraft.

Edited May 13, 2016 by Interplanet Janet

The missile explodes on the pad, and the nonfunctional spacecraft deorbits and hits your house.

i am going to bop to kill the kraken

The Kraken is already dead. Can't you see the 'X' eyes?

I fly an Aeris 3A into Jool.

...

I send an asteroid onto an impact course with Duna using Kerbin's gravity.

Edited May 14, 2016 by Interplanet Janet

You mess up the gravity assist, and the asteroid hits your house

I send an ice cream mining mission to minmus...

It's toxic and everyone dies.

 

I construct a manufacturing plant in orbit of Pluto...

It takes so long to travel between Pluto and Earth that your manufacturer goes out of business.

 

I colonize Dres

Then, budget cuts occur, and you must resort to another nearby object.

I build a small satellite to be placed in a Molniya Orbit, giving communications to the North Pole.

18 minutes ago, Astrofox said:

Then, budget cuts occur, and you must resort to another nearby object.

I build a small satellite to be placed in a Molniya Orbit, giving communications to the North Pole.

The satellite burns up in the atmosphere and crashes down 

I build a small ssto to send to the Mün

The SSTO was horribly unstable in flight, and the crew had to bail out shortly after takeoff.

I launch an unmanned probe to Eve, to land on it of course.

The parachutes fail to deploy and it instead becomes an impactor. Hey, at least a nearby lander recorded seismic data!

I make a small, but functional, vessel.

Turns out there was an asterix beside functional, and therefore did not actually mean that it was functional - which in turn sent it flying into Kerbin shortly after its launch.

The Kerbals start building a small moon...

When they realise, in fact, that "that's no moon". The Death Star turns on them and blows Kerbin to smithereens.

I send a tiny science rover to the Mun with a sky crane.

The rover blows up because the Mun has no sky Or, on a more "serious" note, it lands before you realize you forgot the science. (Happened to me once...It was awful)

I take an FTL to the planet Kepler-452b, in an attempt to put a bunch of Earth organisms on the planet and see how they survive.

They survive, but then a few aeons later they come back and kill us all.

I attempt to divide by zero.

You are NaN'd to infinity, before coming to rest in a featureless black void which is apparently at an altitude of 666666 meters above...something.

I take the square root of negative one.

i

What did you expect? That's not even a space mission!

 

I shoot one of those soda bottle rockets out an airlock on the ISS.  Totally for scientific research purposes. Definitely. See? I'm holding a clipboard. Very scientific. And a pen. I have a pen to write science on my clipboard with. *writes the word "SCIENCE" on clipboard* *uses pen spring to launch it across the module* Woosh! Rockets. I'm doing rocket science on my clipboard. 

Edited May 20, 2016 by cubinator

The thrust sends it burning up in the atmosphere.

I try to launch probes to Usta, Dres, and Qlass.

All get redirected to Dres!!!!! 

FOR DRES!!!!!!!! 

I send a ship to literally hug Dres. It's a giant Kerbal with a sanic mask, hugging Dres.

Dres reveals its canyon to be a mouth by eating your ship.

I make the Death Star 3, only that it is just a giant metal sphere with a 3000 km radius.

Edited May 20, 2016 by ProtoJeb21
I launch a probe on a escape trajectory from the Kerbol system...

Over time, it decelerates and then falls back into the system. Then, the probe collides with Laythe, and therefore gives life to Laythe.

I send a probe to Laythe to investigate the life forms.

It gets eaten before taking any pictures.

I make a ladder on a 72 km tall launch clamp, then have a Kerbal climb up the whole thing and jump onto a station whose orbit intercepts said clamp. Yes, I'm expecting the whole thing to explode. I'm not trying to accomplish anything productive.

It explodes

 

im sending 4 rockets to drace

28 minutes ago, Kerbal kerman said:

It explodes

 

im sending 4 rockets to drace

drace isn't a real planet so you drift in kerbolar orbit

I attempt to do a manned sample return from eve
